Posts.Content: Hi - I am the first time on the computer - I was diagnos with met in the liver, shortly after a stage 0.  Quite shoking,  I had 10 weeks of chemo and 9 mon of no evidence of disease.  I am very happy to see your mail "survival" rate language - very hopeful for me.
Posts.Title: "Survival" rate language

Posts.Content: Hi I want to share some hope, I was diagnos with DCIS, then it went to my liver, I had 10 weeks of chemo, I am 9 months cancer free - and, and doing well, nutrition helps, contact AMC they can send a book, before, during and after treatment.
Posts.Title: my Sister breast cancer has traveled to her neck and lungs

Posts.Content: Hi I first was diagnos at state 0, then it went to my liver I had 6 chemo treatments, now in no evidence of disease for 9 months.  Just wanted to share my story - my emotions get the best of me and I feel like the scans are around the corner.
Posts.Title: breast cancer state 4 in the liver
